short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly generate QR codes for any webpage with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your digital life with the URL QR Code Generator, an intuitive Chrome extension designed to enhance the way you share URLs across devices. With just a single click, this tool generates a QR code for the webpage you're browsing, making it instantly ready to share or save.

Features and Benefits:

✓ One-Click Convenience: Forget the hassle of multiple clicks. Generate QR codes with a single click directly from your browser toolbar.

✓ Instant Access: Pin the extension to your Chrome toolbar for immediate access, no matter which page you're on.

✓ Versatile Use: Ideal for presentations, sharing web content with others in meetings, or transferring web links to your mobile devices.

✓ Secure and Private: Operates entirely offline without requiring any special permissions, ensuring your browsing data stays private.

✓ User-Friendly Interface: Features a clean, straightforward interface that doesn’t complicate its utility.

How to Use:

1. Install the Extension: Add the URL QR Code Generator to Chrome.

2. Pin It: Pin the extension for easy access by clicking the puzzle icon in Chrome and then the pin next to the extension’s name.

3. Generate QR Codes: Click the QR Code icon anytime to create a QR code from the URL of the current page.

4. Interact with QR Codes: Use the popup to copy, download, or directly interact with the generated QR code.
